   <script type="text/javascript">
    <!-- viewport meta metaTag -->
 
     var AndroidHelper = {};
     AndroidHelper.ua = navigator.userAgent;
     AndroidHelper.isAndroid = function () {
         return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") > -1;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.androidVersion = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             var substring = AndroidHelper.ua.substring(AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") + 8);
             
             return parseFloat(substring);
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Mobile") > -1;
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
 
     var viewport = {};
     viewport.dpr = window.devicePixelRatio;
     viewport.sWidth = screen.width;
     viewport.sHeight = screen.height;
     viewport.sMax = Math.max(viewport.sWidth, viewport.sHeight);
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && typeof(viewport.dpr) === 'number') {
         viewport.sMax /= viewport.dpr;
     }
 
     
     //Test if it is a mobile device in terms of spec
     var metaTag = document.createElement("meta");
     metaTag.name = "viewport";
     var widthValue;
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && AndroidHelper.androidVersion < 3) {
         widthValue = AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile ? '320' : '1024';
     } else {
         widthValue = (viewport.sMax < 960) ? 'device-width, initial-scale=1' : '1024';
     }
     metaTag.setAttribute("content", 'width=' + widthValue);
     document.head.appendChild(metaTag)
     delete viewport;
     delete AndroidHelper;
   </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function toggleParentForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'block');
     }
     function toggleChildForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'none');
     }
           </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function toggleParentForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'block');
     }
     function toggleChildForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'none');
     }
           </script>
          </li>

            <div class="headlines" data-subheadline="smart feiert den 20. Geburtstag.">
             <h1>
              &gt;&gt; 20 years of thinking forward.
             </h1>
             <h2>
              <i>
               smart
              </i>
              <i>
               feiert
              </i>
              <i>
               den
              </i>
              <i>
               20.
              </i>
              <i>
               Geburtstag.
              </i>

             <a class="nba button" href="/de/de/index/20-years-smart.html">

     if (Smart !== undefined) {
             var pageAnalytics  = new Smart.Pageanalytics();

             Smart.digitalData = {

   <div class="mod modPageanalytics">
    <script type="text/javascript">
     jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
             if(typeof window.record == 'function') {
                 var pageAnalytics = new Smart.Pageanalytics();
                 var pageTrackData = {};
                 pageTrackData.campaignTrackingCode = s.getAndPersistValue(pageTrackData.csrefParam,'s_getval',1);
                 pageTrackData.componentTitle = pageAnalytics.collectTitles().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.componentType = pageAnalytics.collectTypes().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.countryVersion = pageAnalytics.countryVersion("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.csrefParam = s.getValOnce(s.getQueryParam('csref'),'s_campaign');
                 pageTrackData.hierarchy = "index";
                 pageTrackData.language = "de";
                 pageTrackData.levelN = "Home";
                 pageTrackData.level2 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level3 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level4 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level5 = "";
                 pageTrackData.loggedInStatus = Smart.User.getInstance().isLoggedIn() ? 'logged' : 'notlogged';
                 pageTrackData.pageName = "index";
                 pageTrackData.pageType = "homepage";
                 pageTrackData.pidParam = s.getQueryParam('pid');
                 pageTrackData.platform = "mpc";
                 pageTrackData.platformType = pageAnalytics.platformType('HOMEPAGE');
                 pageTrackData.server = window.location.hostname;
                 pageTrackData.siteversion = "newsmart";
                 pageTrackData.smartCenter = pageAnalytics.smartCenter("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.viewport = Smart.Viewport.getInstance().getKey();
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageName = pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageName;
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageType = pageTrackData.platform + ":" + pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageType;
                 
                 Smart = Smart || Class.extend({});
                 Smart.pageTrackData = pageTrackData;
                 
                 if(typeof s_gi === "function") {
                     s_gi = function(){return s;};
                 }
                 
                 if (typeof s.t === "function") {
                     document.pageTrackingDone = false;
                     s.t_bak = s.t;
                     s.t = function(args){
                         s.t_bak(args);
                         if (!document.smartPageTrackingDone) {
                             document.smartPageTrackingDone = true;
                             jQuery(document).trigger("Smart.pageTrackingDone");
                         }
                     }
                 }
             }
         });
    </script>

   <meta content="smart: open your mind." property="og:title"/>
   <meta content="Innovativer, intelligenter, individueller: Die Mobilitätslösungen von smart stellen den Status Quo in Frage. Erfahren Sie hier mehr." property="og:description"/>
   <meta content="http://www.smart.de/content/dam/smart/HQ/master/index/Visuals-MY-Update-2014/Open-Graph/0003_fortwo_home_fortwo_2014.jpg" property="og:image"/>
   <meta content="http://www.smart.de/de/de/index.html" property="og:url"/>
   <meta content="de_DE" property="og:locale"/>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    <!-- viewport meta metaTag -->
 
     var AndroidHelper = {};
     AndroidHelper.ua = navigator.userAgent;
     AndroidHelper.isAndroid = function () {
         return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") > -1;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.androidVersion = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             var substring = AndroidHelper.ua.substring(AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") + 8);
             
             return parseFloat(substring);
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Mobile") > -1;
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
 
     var viewport = {};
     viewport.dpr = window.devicePixelRatio;
     viewport.sWidth = screen.width;
     viewport.sHeight = screen.height;
     viewport.sMax = Math.max(viewport.sWidth, viewport.sHeight);
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && typeof(viewport.dpr) === 'number') {
         viewport.sMax /= viewport.dpr;
     }
 
     
     //Test if it is a mobile device in terms of spec
     var metaTag = document.createElement("meta");
     metaTag.name = "viewport";
     var widthValue;
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && AndroidHelper.androidVersion < 3) {
         widthValue = AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile ? '320' : '1024';
     } else {
         widthValue = (viewport.sMax < 960) ? 'device-width, initial-scale=1' : '1024';
     }
     metaTag.setAttribute("content", 'width=' + widthValue);
     document.head.appendChild(metaTag)
     delete viewport;
     delete AndroidHelper;
   </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function toggleParentForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'block');
     }
     function toggleChildForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'none');
     }

    <script type="text/javascript">
     if (Smart !== undefined) {
             var pageAnalytics  = new Smart.Pageanalytics();
             var smartViewport = Smart.Viewport.getInstance();
             var smartUser = Smart.User.getInstance();
 
             
             Smart.digitalData = {
                 countryVersion : pageAnalytics.countryVersion("smart mpc-de"),
                 csrefParam : pageAnalytics.getUrlParam('csref'),
                 hierarchy : "index",
                 language : "de",
                 levelN : "Home",
                 level2 : "",
                 level3 : "",
                 level4 : "",
                 level5 : "",
                 loggedInStatus  : smartUser.getUserState() ? 'logged' : 'notlogged',
                 pageName : "index",
                 pageType : "homepage",
                 pageId : pageAnalytics.getUrlHash('servicepage.id') || "index",
                 platform : "mpc",
                 server : window.location.hostname,
                 siteversion : "newsmart",
                 smartCenter : pageAnalytics.smartCenter("smart mpc-de"),
                 viewport : smartViewport.getKey(),
                 viewportWithPageName : smartViewport.getKey() + ":" + "index",
                 viewportWithPageType : "mpc" + ":" + smartViewport.getKey() + ":" + "homepage"
             };
         }
    </script>

   <div class="mod modPageanalytics">
    <script type="text/javascript">
     jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
             if(typeof window.record == 'function') {
                 var pageAnalytics = new Smart.Pageanalytics();
                 var pageTrackData = {};
                 pageTrackData.campaignTrackingCode = s.getAndPersistValue(pageTrackData.csrefParam,'s_getval',1);
                 pageTrackData.componentTitle = pageAnalytics.collectTitles().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.componentType = pageAnalytics.collectTypes().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.countryVersion = pageAnalytics.countryVersion("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.csrefParam = s.getValOnce(s.getQueryParam('csref'),'s_campaign');
                 pageTrackData.hierarchy = "index";
                 pageTrackData.language = "de";
                 pageTrackData.levelN = "Home";
                 pageTrackData.level2 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level3 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level4 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level5 = "";
                 pageTrackData.loggedInStatus = Smart.User.getInstance().isLoggedIn() ? 'logged' : 'notlogged';
                 pageTrackData.pageName = "index";
                 pageTrackData.pageType = "homepage";
                 pageTrackData.pidParam = s.getQueryParam('pid');
                 pageTrackData.platform = "mpc";
                 pageTrackData.platformType = pageAnalytics.platformType('HOMEPAGE');
                 pageTrackData.server = window.location.hostname;
                 pageTrackData.siteversion = "newsmart";
                 pageTrackData.smartCenter = pageAnalytics.smartCenter("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.viewport = Smart.Viewport.getInstance().getKey();
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageName = pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageName;
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageType = pageTrackData.platform + ":" + pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageType;
                 
                 Smart = Smart || Class.extend({});
                 Smart.pageTrackData = pageTrackData;
                 
                 if(typeof s_gi === "function") {
                     s_gi = function(){return s;};
                 }
                 
                 if (typeof s.t === "function") {
                     document.pageTrackingDone = false;
                     s.t_bak = s.t;
                     s.t = function(args){
                         s.t_bak(args);
                         if (!document.smartPageTrackingDone) {
                             document.smartPageTrackingDone = true;
                             jQuery(document).trigger("Smart.pageTrackingDone");
                         }
                     }
                 }
             }
         });
    </script>
    <div record="'pageViewHomepage', Smart.pageTrackData">

  <head>
   <meta charset="utf-8"/>
   <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="content-type"/>
   <meta content="IE=edge,chrome=1" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"/>
   <meta content="no" http-equiv="imagetoolbar"/>
   <title>
    Home | smart Deutschland
   </title>
   <meta content="Innovativer, intelligenter, individueller: Die Mobilitätslösungen von smart stellen den Status Quo in Frage. Erfahren Sie hier mehr." name="description"/>
   <meta content="smart: open your mind." property="og:title"/>
   <meta content="Innovativer, intelligenter, individueller: Die Mobilitätslösungen von smart stellen den Status Quo in Frage. Erfahren Sie hier mehr." property="og:description"/>
   <meta content="http://www.smart.de/content/dam/smart/HQ/master/index/Visuals-MY-Update-2014/Open-Graph/0003_fortwo_home_fortwo_2014.jpg" property="og:image"/>
   <meta content="http://www.smart.de/de/de/index.html" property="og:url"/>
   <meta content="de_DE" property="og:locale"/>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    <!-- viewport meta metaTag -->
 
     var AndroidHelper = {};
     AndroidHelper.ua = navigator.userAgent;
     AndroidHelper.isAndroid = function () {
         return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") > -1;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.androidVersion = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             var substring = AndroidHelper.ua.substring(AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") + 8);
             
             return parseFloat(substring);
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Mobile") > -1;
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
 
     var viewport = {};
     viewport.dpr = window.devicePixelRatio;
     viewport.sWidth = screen.width;
     viewport.sHeight = screen.height;
     viewport.sMax = Math.max(viewport.sWidth, viewport.sHeight);
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && typeof(viewport.dpr) === 'number') {
         viewport.sMax /= viewport.dpr;
     }
 
     
     //Test if it is a mobile device in terms of spec
     var metaTag = document.createElement("meta");
     metaTag.name = "viewport";
     var widthValue;
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && AndroidHelper.androidVersion < 3) {
         widthValue = AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile ? '320' : '1024';
     } else {
         widthValue = (viewport.sMax < 960) ? 'device-width, initial-scale=1' : '1024';
     }
     metaTag.setAttribute("content", 'width=' + widthValue);
     document.head.appendChild(metaTag)
     delete viewport;
     delete AndroidHelper;
   </script>
   <meta content="index, follow" name="robots"/>
   <meta content="jdvEz7nExi1GEUsBdX8nqBCBNANvItFIg4ND0-X3Vb4" name="google-site-verification"/>
   <meta content="noarchive" name="googlebot"/>

   <link href="/etc/designs/smart/img/touchicons/apple-touch-icon-144x144-precomposed.png" rel="apple-touch-icon-precomposed" sizes="144x144"/>
   <link href="/etc/designs/smart/img/touchicons/apple-touch-icon-120x120-precomposed.png" rel="apple-touch-icon-precomposed" sizes="120x120"/>
   <link href="/etc/designs/smart/img/touchicons/apple-touch-icon-114x114-precomposed.png" rel="apple-touch-icon-precomposed" sizes="114x114"/>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function toggleParentForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'block');
     }
     function toggleChildForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'none');
     }
           </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function toggleParentForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'block');
     }
     function toggleChildForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'none');
     }
           </script>

          <svg class="modStickynavigation__icon icon-svg icon-svg-arrow-right">
           <use xlink:href="#icon-svg-arrow-right">
           </use>
          </svg>
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a class="servicePageLink" data-href="/de/de/index/servicepage-library/consultation.html" data-servicepage-id="consultation" data-tracking-elementname="navigation:C-STICKY:Beratung" href="#">

   <div class="mod modPageanalytics">
    <script type="text/javascript">
     jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
             if(typeof window.record == 'function') {
                 var pageAnalytics = new Smart.Pageanalytics();
                 var pageTrackData = {};
                 pageTrackData.campaignTrackingCode = s.getAndPersistValue(pageTrackData.csrefParam,'s_getval',1);
                 pageTrackData.componentTitle = pageAnalytics.collectTitles().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.componentType = pageAnalytics.collectTypes().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.countryVersion = pageAnalytics.countryVersion("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.csrefParam = s.getValOnce(s.getQueryParam('csref'),'s_campaign');
                 pageTrackData.hierarchy = "index";
                 pageTrackData.language = "de";
                 pageTrackData.levelN = "Home";
                 pageTrackData.level2 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level3 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level4 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level5 = "";
                 pageTrackData.loggedInStatus = Smart.User.getInstance().isLoggedIn() ? 'logged' : 'notlogged';
                 pageTrackData.pageName = "index";
                 pageTrackData.pageType = "homepage";
                 pageTrackData.pidParam = s.getQueryParam('pid');
                 pageTrackData.platform = "mpc";
                 pageTrackData.platformType = pageAnalytics.platformType('HOMEPAGE');
                 pageTrackData.server = window.location.hostname;
                 pageTrackData.siteversion = "newsmart";
                 pageTrackData.smartCenter = pageAnalytics.smartCenter("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.viewport = Smart.Viewport.getInstance().getKey();
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageName = pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageName;
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageType = pageTrackData.platform + ":" + pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageType;
                 
                 Smart = Smart || Class.extend({});
                 Smart.pageTrackData = pageTrackData;
                 
                 if(typeof s_gi === "function") {
                     s_gi = function(){return s;};
                 }
                 
                 if (typeof s.t === "function") {
                     document.pageTrackingDone = false;
                     s.t_bak = s.t;
                     s.t = function(args){
                         s.t_bak(args);
                         if (!document.smartPageTrackingDone) {
                             document.smartPageTrackingDone = true;
                             jQuery(document).trigger("Smart.pageTrackingDone");
                         }
                     }
                 }
             }
         });
    </script>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    <!-- viewport meta metaTag -->
 
     var AndroidHelper = {};
     AndroidHelper.ua = navigator.userAgent;
     AndroidHelper.isAndroid = function () {
         return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") > -1;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.androidVersion = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             var substring = AndroidHelper.ua.substring(AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") + 8);
             
             return parseFloat(substring);
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Mobile") > -1;
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
 
     var viewport = {};
     viewport.dpr = window.devicePixelRatio;
     viewport.sWidth = screen.width;
     viewport.sHeight = screen.height;
     viewport.sMax = Math.max(viewport.sWidth, viewport.sHeight);
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && typeof(viewport.dpr) === 'number') {
         viewport.sMax /= viewport.dpr;
     }
 
     
     //Test if it is a mobile device in terms of spec
     var metaTag = document.createElement("meta");
     metaTag.name = "viewport";
     var widthValue;
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && AndroidHelper.androidVersion < 3) {
         widthValue = AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile ? '320' : '1024';
     } else {
         widthValue = (viewport.sMax < 960) ? 'device-width, initial-scale=1' : '1024';
     }
     metaTag.setAttribute("content", 'width=' + widthValue);
     document.head.appendChild(metaTag)
     delete viewport;
     delete AndroidHelper;
   </script>

          <li class="nav-item action-nav-item login-nav-item">
           <div class="mod modLoginLandingFlyout" data-connectors="200" data-login-selection-enabled="true" data-logout-redirect-after="3" data-logout-use-fallback="true">
            <a class="nav-title nav-title-login e-copytext6" href="#">
             <span class="nav-title-text">
              Connect

            <div class="flyout-content">

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function toggleParentForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'block');
     }
     function toggleChildForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'none');
     }

    <script type="text/javascript">
     if (Smart !== undefined) {
             var pageAnalytics  = new Smart.Pageanalytics();
             var smartViewport = Smart.Viewport.getInstance();
             var smartUser = Smart.User.getInstance();
 
             
             Smart.digitalData = {
                 countryVersion : pageAnalytics.countryVersion("smart mpc-de"),
                 csrefParam : pageAnalytics.getUrlParam('csref'),
                 hierarchy : "index",
                 language : "de",
                 levelN : "Home",
                 level2 : "",
                 level3 : "",
                 level4 : "",
                 level5 : "",
                 loggedInStatus  : smartUser.getUserState() ? 'logged' : 'notlogged',
                 pageName : "index",
                 pageType : "homepage",
                 pageId : pageAnalytics.getUrlHash('servicepage.id') || "index",
                 platform : "mpc",
                 server : window.location.hostname,
                 siteversion : "newsmart",
                 smartCenter : pageAnalytics.smartCenter("smart mpc-de"),
                 viewport : smartViewport.getKey(),
                 viewportWithPageName : smartViewport.getKey() + ":" + "index",
                 viewportWithPageType : "mpc" + ":" + smartViewport.getKey() + ":" + "homepage"

   <div class="mod modPageanalytics">
    <script type="text/javascript">
     jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
             if(typeof window.record == 'function') {
                 var pageAnalytics = new Smart.Pageanalytics();
                 var pageTrackData = {};
                 pageTrackData.campaignTrackingCode = s.getAndPersistValue(pageTrackData.csrefParam,'s_getval',1);
                 pageTrackData.componentTitle = pageAnalytics.collectTitles().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.componentType = pageAnalytics.collectTypes().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.countryVersion = pageAnalytics.countryVersion("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.csrefParam = s.getValOnce(s.getQueryParam('csref'),'s_campaign');
                 pageTrackData.hierarchy = "index";
                 pageTrackData.language = "de";
                 pageTrackData.levelN = "Home";
                 pageTrackData.level2 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level3 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level4 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level5 = "";
                 pageTrackData.loggedInStatus = Smart.User.getInstance().isLoggedIn() ? 'logged' : 'notlogged';
                 pageTrackData.pageName = "index";
                 pageTrackData.pageType = "homepage";
                 pageTrackData.pidParam = s.getQueryParam('pid');
                 pageTrackData.platform = "mpc";
                 pageTrackData.platformType = pageAnalytics.platformType('HOMEPAGE');
                 pageTrackData.server = window.location.hostname;
                 pageTrackData.siteversion = "newsmart";
                 pageTrackData.smartCenter = pageAnalytics.smartCenter("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.viewport = Smart.Viewport.getInstance().getKey();
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageName = pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageName;
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageType = pageTrackData.platform + ":" + pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageType;
                 
                 Smart = Smart || Class.extend({});
                 Smart.pageTrackData = pageTrackData;
                 
                 if(typeof s_gi === "function") {
                     s_gi = function(){return s;};
                 }
                 
                 if (typeof s.t === "function") {
                     document.pageTrackingDone = false;
                     s.t_bak = s.t;
                     s.t = function(args){
                         s.t_bak(args);
                         if (!document.smartPageTrackingDone) {
                             document.smartPageTrackingDone = true;
                             jQuery(document).trigger("Smart.pageTrackingDone");
                         }
                     }
                 }
             }
         });
    </script>

  <head>
   <meta charset="utf-8"/>
   <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="content-type"/>
   <meta content="IE=edge,chrome=1" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"/>
   <meta content="no" http-equiv="imagetoolbar"/>
   <title>
    Home | smart Deutschland
   </title>
   <meta content="Innovativer, intelligenter, individueller: Die Mobilitätslösungen von smart stellen den Status Quo in Frage. Erfahren Sie hier mehr." name="description"/>
   <meta content="smart: open your mind." property="og:title"/>
   <meta content="Innovativer, intelligenter, individueller: Die Mobilitätslösungen von smart stellen den Status Quo in Frage. Erfahren Sie hier mehr." property="og:description"/>
   <meta content="http://www.smart.de/content/dam/smart/HQ/master/index/Visuals-MY-Update-2014/Open-Graph/0003_fortwo_home_fortwo_2014.jpg" property="og:image"/>
   <meta content="http://www.smart.de/de/de/index.html" property="og:url"/>
   <meta content="de_DE" property="og:locale"/>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    <!-- viewport meta metaTag -->
 
     var AndroidHelper = {};
     AndroidHelper.ua = navigator.userAgent;
     AndroidHelper.isAndroid = function () {
         return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") > -1;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.androidVersion = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             var substring = AndroidHelper.ua.substring(AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Android") + 8);
             
             return parseFloat(substring);
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
     AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile = function () {
         if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid) {
             return AndroidHelper.ua.indexOf("Mobile") > -1;
         }
         return undefined;
     }();
 
     var viewport = {};
     viewport.dpr = window.devicePixelRatio;
     viewport.sWidth = screen.width;
     viewport.sHeight = screen.height;
     viewport.sMax = Math.max(viewport.sWidth, viewport.sHeight);
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && typeof(viewport.dpr) === 'number') {
         viewport.sMax /= viewport.dpr;
     }
 
     
     //Test if it is a mobile device in terms of spec
     var metaTag = document.createElement("meta");
     metaTag.name = "viewport";
     var widthValue;
     if (AndroidHelper.isAndroid && AndroidHelper.androidVersion < 3) {
         widthValue = AndroidHelper.isAndroidMobile ? '320' : '1024';
     } else {
         widthValue = (viewport.sMax < 960) ? 'device-width, initial-scale=1' : '1024';
     }
     metaTag.setAttribute("content", 'width=' + widthValue);
     document.head.appendChild(metaTag)
     delete viewport;
     delete AndroidHelper;
   </script>
   <meta content="index, follow" name="robots"/>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function toggleParentForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'block');
     }
     function toggleChildForm() {
         $('[id="new-login-form"]').css('display', 'block');
         $('[id="ciam-login-form"]').css('display', 'none');
         $('[id="backlink-for-new-login-flyout"]').css('display', 'none');
     }

     $CQ(function() {
         CQ_Analytics.SegmentMgr.loadSegments("/etc/segmentation");

   <!-- persistentStorage is enabled -->
   <script data-storage-base-path="/pab/cc/rest/Storage/" id="persistentStorageInit" src="https://storage.smart.com/pab/cc/rest/Storage/id?callback=persistentStorageIdCallback" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="/etc/designs/smart/js/application.4.7.2.js" type="text/javascript">

   <script src="/etc/designs/smart/analytics.min.4.7.2.js" type="text/javascript">

   <div class="mod modPageanalytics">
    <script type="text/javascript">
     if (Smart !== undefined) {
             var pageAnalytics  = new Smart.Pageanalytics();
             var smartViewport = Smart.Viewport.getInstance();
             var smartUser = Smart.User.getInstance();
 
             
             Smart.digitalData = {
                 countryVersion : pageAnalytics.countryVersion("smart mpc-de"),
                 csrefParam : pageAnalytics.getUrlParam('csref'),
                 hierarchy : "index",
                 language : "de",
                 levelN : "Home",
                 level2 : "",
                 level3 : "",
                 level4 : "",
                 level5 : "",
                 loggedInStatus  : smartUser.getUserState() ? 'logged' : 'notlogged',
                 pageName : "index",
                 pageType : "homepage",
                 pageId : pageAnalytics.getUrlHash('servicepage.id') || "index",
                 platform : "mpc",
                 server : window.location.hostname,
                 siteversion : "newsmart",
                 smartCenter : pageAnalytics.smartCenter("smart mpc-de"),
                 viewport : smartViewport.getKey(),
                 viewportWithPageName : smartViewport.getKey() + ":" + "index",
                 viewportWithPageType : "mpc" + ":" + smartViewport.getKey() + ":" + "homepage"
             };
         }
    </script>
   </div>
   <div class="mod modPageanalytics">
    <script type="text/javascript">
     jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
             if(typeof window.record == 'function') {
                 var pageAnalytics = new Smart.Pageanalytics();
                 var pageTrackData = {};
                 pageTrackData.campaignTrackingCode = s.getAndPersistValue(pageTrackData.csrefParam,'s_getval',1);
                 pageTrackData.componentTitle = pageAnalytics.collectTitles().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.componentType = pageAnalytics.collectTypes().join('|');
                 pageTrackData.countryVersion = pageAnalytics.countryVersion("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.csrefParam = s.getValOnce(s.getQueryParam('csref'),'s_campaign');
                 pageTrackData.hierarchy = "index";
                 pageTrackData.language = "de";
                 pageTrackData.levelN = "Home";
                 pageTrackData.level2 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level3 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level4 = "";
                 pageTrackData.level5 = "";
                 pageTrackData.loggedInStatus = Smart.User.getInstance().isLoggedIn() ? 'logged' : 'notlogged';
                 pageTrackData.pageName = "index";
                 pageTrackData.pageType = "homepage";
                 pageTrackData.pidParam = s.getQueryParam('pid');
                 pageTrackData.platform = "mpc";
                 pageTrackData.platformType = pageAnalytics.platformType('HOMEPAGE');
                 pageTrackData.server = window.location.hostname;
                 pageTrackData.siteversion = "newsmart";
                 pageTrackData.smartCenter = pageAnalytics.smartCenter("smart mpc-de");
                 pageTrackData.viewport = Smart.Viewport.getInstance().getKey();
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageName = pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageName;
                 pageTrackData.viewportWithPageType = pageTrackData.platform + ":" + pageTrackData.viewport + ":" + pageTrackData.pageType;
                 
                 Smart = Smart || Class.extend({});
                 Smart.pageTrackData = pageTrackData;
                 
                 if(typeof s_gi === "function") {
                     s_gi = function(){return s;};
                 }
                 
                 if (typeof s.t === "function") {
                     document.pageTrackingDone = false;
                     s.t_bak = s.t;
                     s.t = function(args){
                         s.t_bak(args);
                         if (!document.smartPageTrackingDone) {
                             document.smartPageTrackingDone = true;
                             jQuery(document).trigger("Smart.pageTrackingDone");
                         }
                     }
                 }
             }
         });
    </script>
    <div record="'pageViewHomepage', Smart.pageTrackData">
    </div>
   </div>

   </a>

    </div>
